recipe.title: Green Apple Sorbet
ingredients: 6 Granny Smith apples (2 2/3 lb), cut into 1-inch wedges
an electric juice extractor and an ice-cream maker
instructions: Simmer sugar and water in a small heavy saucepan, stirring, until sugar is dissolved, then remove from heat. Crush vitamin C tablet to a powder with a mortar and pestle or the back of a spoon and place in a 1-quart container that will fit under spout of juicer. Using electric juicer, juice apples into container. Spoon off foam and stir in sugar syrup. Chill, covered, until cold, at least 1 hour. Freeze in ice-cream maker.
